attributes.action: Remove the inequality in the Child Support System (CSA), by transferring all case onto a single system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CSA are operating two systems, which for non-resident parent has significant implications. For example a NRP paying £570 / month for one child under the ‘old system’ rules, would under the ‘new system’ pay £217 / month less. However the NRP won’t be transferred on the new system until about 2015 and then the transfer process will reduce payments over a number of years. If you consider the payments over the 7.5 years the NRP will be paying an extra £20000
